text: USS Viking has been the name of more than one United States Navy ship, and may refer to: * , a converted yacht in commission from May to September 1898 and from September to October 1899 * , a patrol boat in service from 1918 to 1919 * , a rescue and salvage ship commissioned in 1942 and stricken in 1953 ==See also== * Viking (disambiguation)#Ships Category:United States Navy ship names
title: USS Viking
